PostProcessShader
This implementation of ShaderAPI contains the general full-screen post-process shader.
RippleDistortion
A 60-frame animated ripple-shaped distortion object.
ShaderAPI
An interface designed to allow shaders to be instanced and managed.
ShaderAPI.RenderOrder
Render order: OBJECT_SPACE, WORLD_SPACE, DISTORTED_SPACE, then SCREEN_SPACE
ShaderHook
Internal every frame hook that runs each shader in turn.
ShaderLib
This class performs a variety of functions designed to assist in shader-writing.
ShaderLib.QuickHandler
 
ShaderModPlugin
This is the base mod plugin for ShaderLib, which initializes its shaders.

ShipDestructionEffects
